name: Recoil VS The World (itch)
description:
Using the recoil of your guns, you shoot your way through claustrophobic saw blade filled levels. Turn lasers off, switch guns mid-level, and much more throughout 3 different biomes, each with their own new obstacles and levels to make a fun but rage-inducing experience!

Features:
3 biomes filled with 10 levels + new and exciting obstacles and guns!
Cute and cartoony pixel graphics!
Juicy and good-feeling gameplay throughout!
30 levels are getting harder and harder!
